requirements: After CHEM 161, 165, or 167 (or CHEM 115), MATH 120, and PHYS 181, or equivalents.
description:
Basic principles that control the physical and chemical properties of Earth materials. Thermodynamics, equation of state, phase transformations, elastic properties and phase diagrams.
After CHEM 161, 165, or 167 (or CHEM 115), MATH 120, and PHYS 181, or equivalents.

long_title: Introduction to the Physics and Chemistry of Earth Materials
